channel.title: Team Fortress 2: Halloween Update
channel.description:
That's right sissies of all ages, a new TF2 update.
[url]https://www.teamfortress.com/[/url]
and the halloween update here: [url]https://www.teamfortress.com/pumpkinpatch/[/url]
It is supposed to come out late night today (october 29), the update (Day 1?) brings a brand new King Of The Hill map called Harvest. All that I can speculate to it is that the ghosts might stun you if you look close enough and straight at them, and that there are explosive pumpkins which probably act like barrels. There are also 5 new hats, all of them tied to an achievement and 1 of them tied to both a soldier-type of win and an achievement. The Ghostly Ghibus hat can be obtained by getting to the site it is hidden or dominating someone who has it while playing KOTH_Harvest.
This made me jizz, how about you?
Also I'll edit this post if a day 2 comes out.
There was also a bug that caused many players to gain 2-7 hats at one moment.

item.title: Team Fortress 2: Halloween Update
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
Jack:

Yeah, but it’s FRICKIN MUGGING THEN STABBING THEM RIGHT IN THE FACE to get it for $2.50

So fucking true. Too bad all the other companies still aren’t getting that this is one of the best ways to please your fans and make more fans.

Read full topic

item.title: Team Fortress 2: Halloween Update
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
The event is now until November 9th and the Team fortress team is now back to working on TF2. Huzzah!

Also new blog post, and yes I know this is a double-bump.’

New blag post.

item.title: Team Fortress 2: Halloween Update
item.dc:creator: Magical_Master
item.description:
Well, I bought FRAPS two days ago ($37), will likely buy L4D2 ($50?), and Black Mesa will also be out within the next few months…not sure how much time I’d even spend playing TF2, hence my hesitation to spend $20 on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Team Fortress 2: Halloween Update
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
Magical Master:

Goddamn I missed the $2.50 sale twice. Gotta be fucking kidding me…

Ugh. I’ve been wanting to try a demo if they released another class update, but I’d spent $2.50 for it in a heartbeat…hell, even $5-10 in a second. Bleh.

The game is a steal anyways at 20 dollars, I would even pay 50 for the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Team Fortress 2: Halloween Update
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
I got all the achievements today, the hardest part was finding a 24 slot vanilla-ish server that played Harvest.

In a crazy attempt to bump this thread VALVe is selling Team Fortress 2 for 2.49$ US until 7:00 PM PST. It’s craaaaazy!

item.title: Team Fortress 2: Halloween Update
item.dc:creator: Wasabi
item.description:
I got the hat from the page. Got one of the last ones, as when I told a couple mates they’d run out of hats. I now have two Ghastly Gibus hats, one from the Steam sign up and the other from the domination achievement. Got the other achievements this morning. Nice and simple, just what a 3 day event needs.
